info.p: We recommend that you set the partition name to a descriptive name for the availability zone controlled by the CC. For example: cluster01.
The component must be a unique name. We recommend that you use a short-hand name of the hostname or IP address of the machine, like cc-[hostname] or cc-[IP address].

postreq.note: For HA, register the secondary CC the same way, replacing the CC IP address and CC name, but using the same partition name as the primary CC.
